segment.documentation: BGM, A segment identifying the Reservation message.
LAN, A segment identifying the language used in a transaction.
PCD, A segment containing a percentage factor which relates to the services or products requested in the whole message.
DTM, Segment(s) specifying a date that applies to the message, (e.g. date of this message, date until such message is valid).
FTX, A segment for information in coded or clear form to provide any other information related to the whole message.
LOC, A segment containing location information pertaining to the services or products requested in the whole message.
MOA, A segment containing the monetary amounts to be paid by the sender for all services or products requested in the whole message.
FII, A segment containing financial institution information relating to the services or products requested in the whole message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments indicating references relating to the message.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment containing references relating to the whole message.
DTM, A segment specifying the date that applies to the previous reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the sender and the receiver and all other parties involved in the transaction and how to communicate information to each of them.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment providing name and address of the parties related to the message (sender, receiver, airline, agent).
RFF, A segment indicating any additional reference(s) for the party identified in the preceding NAD segment.
COM, A segment containing communication information for the party identified in the preceding NAD segment.
LAN, A segment indicating the language to be used by the party identified in the preceding NAD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying a person or a department within a party specified in the preceding NAD segment and how to communicate with them.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the preceding NAD segment, and to whom the communication should be directed.
COM, A segment providing communication information for the person or department identified in the preceding CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments containing payment instructions related to the message.

segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying payment instructions related to the message.
RFF, A segment containing any reference related to the message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying payment terms and associated dates related to the message.

segment.documentation: PYT, A segment specifying payment terms related to the message.
DTM, A segment to indicate any date and/or time related to the preceding PYT segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments relating to the requested services, products or beneficiaries.

segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment which provides a sequence number for later reference to related services, products or beneficiaries.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: SG13-SG14-SG15-SG16 A group of segments identifying a particular product or service requested.

segment.documentation: IMD, A segment identifying a particular product or service.
QTY, A segment specifying a quantity related to the product or service identified in the preceding IMD segment.
LAN, A segment indicating the language to be used for the requested service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
DTM, A segment to indicate any date and/or time pertaining to the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
RFF, A segment containing reference relating to the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
PCD, A segment containing percentage factors which relate to the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
DIM, A segment providing dimensions which may be required for the provision of the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
FTX, A segment for information in coded or clear form to provide any other information related to the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing contact information for the service or product referenced in the preceding IMD segment.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment providing name and address information related to the service or product referenced in the preceding IMD segment.
COM, A segment providing communication information related to the preceding NAD segment.
LAN, A segment providing language information related to the preceding NAD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments providing identity and contact information related to the preceding NAD segment.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment providing contact information related to the preceding NAD segment.
COM, A segment providing communication information related to the preceding CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments containing location information pertaining to the service or product referenced in the preceding IMD segment.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment containing location information pertaining to the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
DTM, A segment providing date and/or time information relating to the information specified in the preceding LOC segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments providing name and address information relating to the location referenced in the preceding LOC segment.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment providing name and address information relating to the information specified in the preceding LOC segment.
DTM, A segment providing date and/or time information relating to the information specified in the preceding NAD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments containing contact and communication information for a specific person or department related to the name and address referenced in the preceding NAD segment.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment containing contact information for a department or person related to the name and address in the preceding NAD segment.
COM, A segment containing contact information for the person or department referenced in the preceding CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments containing the monetary amount to be paid for the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.

segment.documentation: MOA, A segment containing the monetary amount to be paid for the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
QTY, A segment specifying a quantity related to the preceding MOA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments containing payment instruction information relating to the service or product referenced in the preceding IMD segment.

segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying a payment instructions for the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
RFF, A segment containing reference related to the preceding PAI segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments providing payment terms related to the service or product referenced in the preceding IMD segment.

segment.documentation: PYT, A segment specifying payment terms for the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.
DTM, A segment to indicate any date and/or time pertaining to the payment terms specified in the preceding PYT segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments providing special conditions or additional requirements related to the service or product identified in the preceding IMD segment.

segment.documentation: RCS, A segment to specify types of requirements attached to the provision of a service.
FII, A segment containing financial institution information relating to the special conditions or requirements identified in the preceding RCS segment.
MOA, A segment containing the monetary amount to be paid by the sender for the special conditions or requirements identified in the preceding RCS segment.
RFF, A segment containing reference information relating to the special conditions or requirements identified in the preceding RCS segment.
FTX, A segment for information in coded or clear form to provide any other information related to the preceding RCS segment.
DOC, A segment containing documentation information related to the preceding RCS segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments containing information related to the beneficiaries.

segment.documentation: MEM, A segment specifying relationship between persons within a group.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 18: SG22 A group of segments providing information for groups or individual beneficiaries referenced in the MEM segment.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment specifying name and address information for a group or an individual beneficiary.
ATT, A segment specifying attributes related to the preceding NAD segment.
RFF, A segment providing reference information related to the preceding NAD segment.
LAN, A segment providing language information which relates to the preceding NAD segment.
FTX, A segment for information in coded or clear form to provide any other information related to the preceding NAD segment.
COM, A segment providing communication information related to the preceding NAD segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments providing contact information related to the preceding NAD segment.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment providing contact information related to the preceding NAD segment.
COM, A segment providing communication information related to the preceding CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments providing documentation information related to the preceding NAD segment.

segment.documentation: DOC, A segment specifying a type of document (e.g. passport, visa, driving licence, vaccination certificate, etc.) related to the preceding NAD segment.
LOC, A segment identifying the place of issue of the document referenced in the preceding DOC segment.
DTM, A segment indicating the date of issue of the document referenced in the preceding DOC segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments providing payment information, payment terms, financial institution, monetary amount and references related to the preceding NAD segment.

segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying a method of payment related to the preceding NAD segment.
PYT, A segment providing payment term related to the preceding PAI segment.
FII, A segment providing financial institution information relating to the preceding PAI segment.
MOA, A segment providing monetary information (e.g. a rate request, maximum price, etc...) related to the preceding PAI segment.
RFF, A segment providing reference information related to the preceding PAI segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments providing information of special requirements or conditions related to the preceding NAD segment.

segment.documentation: RCS, A segment to specify a type of requirements (e.g. special diet needs, handicapped facilities, etc...) related to the preceding NAD segment.
MOA, A segment providing a monetary amount related to the special requirements or conditions referenced in the preceding RCS segment.
RFF, A segment containing reference information relating to the special conditions or requirements referenced in the preceding RCS segment.
FTX, A segment specifying information in coded or clear form to provide any other information related to the preceding RCS segment.
